name: Match 2048 (WanSou)
description:
Match 3 with 2048 mechanics Game is controlled using the arrow keys
The win condition is getting 2048 or more points
After you win you can press "Space" to continue playing or "R" to restart

The end screen shows information like :
How many moves you've made
"Points Per Move" which is how many points you've gained per move on average
The biggest piece you've destroyed
and lastly The highest amount of points you've gained in a single move
